name: Nuclear Reaction (PatrickZochAlves)
description:
Nuclear Reaction is a puzzle-action game about creating chain reactions among atoms to generate energy (so you can destroy more atoms, and create more energy...)

This game is an entry for the Go Godot Jam 2 held in November 2021 with the theme: "Energy Source"

Uses a keyboard to play.

I hope you enjoy!

PS.: You might find problems with other browsers than Google Chrome. If you do, you can download the windows or Linux versions.
